attributes.action: I want you to ban school uniform
attributes.additional_details: I want you to stop this old fashioned uniform policy. As it doesn’t affect our learning or behaviour in a positive way . This has got to stop.
attributes.background: I would like you to ban school uniform as it is tiring having to be told about what the expectations are for our uniform and how horrible and uncomfortable it makes us feel i believe that if we stop manufacturing school uniform it will help the cost of energy which is good for the environment

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ban compulsory school uniforms:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
